title: petushka
author: petushka
content: 1000 UNIQUE HAND-DRAWN ARTWORKSLISTING OF THE FIRST 20 ARTWORKS ON BINANCE20/07/2022Please meet Johnny Demonic. Born and raised in the deep of the Underworld, forged in the pit of hellfire, he is nothing like any other demon. He is not all about possessing lost souls, spoiling innocent virgins, or scaring away sweaty exorcists. He is just like one of our own kind, a mere mortal, an ordinary dude. He is fancy, easy-going, good looking, fashionable, slightly weirdo, sometimes even goofy but always, absolutely always cool.Cool as Hell.About Creator'My name is Denis Zilber and I am a freelance illustrator and visual storyteller with more than 17 years of professional experience. I enjoy working in vast variety of artistic fields including advertising, editorial and children's books illustration, video and board games, character design for animation and movies. During past years I have been lucky enough to work with major international magazines as GQ, FHM, Maxim, Playboy, Blazer, The Pitch, National Geographic.'https://johnnydemonic.io/

comments.author: petushka
